ai_summary.welcome_subtitle: Open a new door for your future by analyzing your past.
ai_summary.toast_success_body: Your new personal report has been created.
ai_summary.toast_error_generic: The report could not be created.
ai_summary.recommend_text: The resilience and awareness you showed during this period are admirable. In the coming days, continue to make room for your emotions and listen to your inner voice.
ai_summary.confirm_delete_message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this personal report?
ai_summary.toast_delete_error_body: An error occurred while deleting the report.

onboarding_step1.question: How was your mental energy today? Briefly describe it.

onboarding_step2.question: What has been draining you the most lately?

onboarding_step3.question: What would be a small step this week that would make you feel good?
onboarding_step3.details: Small enough that you can do it right now.

primer.hero_subtitle_big: If you're ready for your first free analysis, let's get started.

softwall.title: Your analysis will illuminate your potential.
softwall.subtitle: If you're ready to discover the personal analysis prepared from your answers, let's take this first step. You're not alone on this journey.
softwall.feature_pattern_desc: Discover the connections between your answers and what they reveal about you.
softwall.feature_potential_desc: See the strength and opportunities behind what drains you.
softwall.feature_step_desc: A personalized start to help you achieve that small goal you mentioned.

recall.title: Shall we return to your previous report?
recall.subtitle: Your answers weren't saved but they're still here. You can sign up in 1 minute to see your analysis.
recall.motivation_text: Keep progressing by continuing from where you left off.

intro.title: Your smart companion for mental clarity
intro.text: Gisbel offers an AI-assisted experience to boost awareness, reveal blind spots, and help you progress with small, effective steps. It works cohesively with primer, login, and analysis flows.

daily_mood.title: Daily Mood Tracking
daily_mood.description: Record how you feel each day. AI analyzes your patterns so you can see progress.

ai_journal.title: AI-Assisted Journaling
ai_journal.description: Receive guiding questions as you write and go deeper into insight.

dream_analysis.title: AI-Powered Dream Analysis
dream_analysis.description: Record dreams and explore possible meanings; discover messages from your subconscious.

ai_reports.title: AI Summary Reports
ai_reports.description: Track your thought patterns and progress through regular, personalized reports.

therapy_sessions.title: Natural Chat Experience
therapy_sessions.description: Voice for natural flow; text for deeper reflectionâ€”there when you need it.

conversation_history.title: Conversation History
conversation_history.description: Keep your conversations safe and revisit them anytime.

1.title: Quick start
1.description: From Home, begin with mood, journal, or dream analysis.

2.title: Simple flow
2.description: Clear guidance to help you reach goals faster.

3.title: Personal Analysis
3.description: See your strengths and first steps with AI summaries and a mini PDF.

4.title: Reinforce progress
4.description: Chats, journals, and dream analyses in one place; track your growth.
